Description.Name: Structural Reinforcement
Description.Details: The internal structure of the Argo's is barely spaceworthy, we still need significant materials to reinforce the core structure and outer hull or she will shake apart during any stressfull maneuvers.

AssignedCastDescription: Commander, It is imperative to finish the structural upgrade, If you want to put any more stress onto the Argo, increase the drive output, and start other upgrades.
